signature:
public static Formatter append(final CharSequence seq, final Formatter formatter, final int flags, final int width,
            final int precision, final CharSequence ellipsis)
name: append
javadoc:
/**
 * Appends a CharSequence to the specified Formatter with the given flags, width, 
 * precision and ellipsis character.
 *
 * @param seq   the CharSequence to be appended
 * @param formatter  the Formatter to append to
 * @param flags     the format flags
 * @param width     the minimum field width
 * @param precision the number of digits after the decimal point for floating-point numbers
 * @param ellipsis  the character used as an ellipsis when truncating a string
 *
 * @return the Formatter object itself to enable method chaining
 */
